expanded.name: Nagaram Nidra Potunna Vela
expanded.description: Nagaram Nidra Potunna Vela is a movie starring Charmy Kaur, Jagapathi Babu, and Satya Prakash. Niharika (Charmi) is a young journalist working in a Telugu News Channel. After being chided by her boss for bringing 'boring' news, she...

review.name: Only for charmi's fans
review.reviewBody: The movie shows the happenings during one night . A lot of poliitcal games are shown . Charmi is a journo looking out for a spicy story she roams around the city in skimpy halter top with a hidden cam . she sees the usual characters like a bunch of poor prostitues being harassed by police , a bunch of male prostitutes waiting for their clients , some politicians planning corruptopn, bribery etc., she takes this tape and gives it to her boss who blackmails the politician into giving him several crores . its difficult to believe she roams around in such clothes all alone aimlessly . she meets Jagapati( who is old for this role but looks per fect with eye bags and cheek sags ) a drunkyard wastrel. he vanishes without a trace after narrating his poignant story. and singing a couple of songs with her . Charmy then takes this tape to the opposition party . she mobilises entire city . the whole givernment falls down due to this tape . Everything finishes in one single night . many scenes don't connect to each other . There is also some story of prejudice towards the girl child some where in the starting of the story .

crew_data.title: Nagaram Nidra Potunna Vela (2011) - Full Cast & Crew - IMDb
